sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: France is hit by more rioting and clashes with the police after a teenager was shot dead by an officer.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Cities across France saw further rioting and clashes with the police on Friday

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: night. Over 470 people have been arrested. Violence fled after a teenager was shot at close range by a police officer in Nanterre, Paris on Tuesday. The officer was arrested and the boy, Nael, will be buried on Saturday. Faced with the chaos, the government suspended public transport from 9 o'clock on Friday evening, banned public gatherings, increased manpower and imposed curfews in an unsuccessful attempt to halt the cycle of violence.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Demonstrations accusing the police of racism and violence were banned in Paris, central Marseille, Lyon, Bordeaux and Toulouse, but hundreds of people still marched with placards calling for the police to be disbanded.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The Algerian government has expressed its concern over the death of Nael, who was a French national of Algerian and Moroccan descent.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: His funeral is set to take place on Saturday morning.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: At least 55 people have died in Kenya following a major road accident in the west of the country. At around 6.30 on Friday evening, a lorry crashed on the Nakura-Kericho motorway,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: hitting people, roadside traders and some vans parked on the roadside.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: By early morning, 45 bodies have been taken to a mortuary, but the estimated death toll is at least 55. More than 60 injured people were taken to various local hospitals, and President William Ruto expressed his condolences after the accident.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Ukraine says it's making advances in its counter-offensive against Russia,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: including targeting a Russian outpost killing troops near Bakhmut.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, Russian forces hit a school in the village of Serhivka in Donetsk on Friday, killing two people and injuring six others.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, Russia, for its part, has been concentrating on long-range airstrikes, with the Russian foreign minister, Sergei Lavrov, insisting Moscow is fighting in Ukraine not for territories but for the Russian people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: One of Ukraine's biggest concerns is in Zaporizhia, where Russia is reportedly reducing its presence at the nuclear power plant.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Ukraine fears an act of sabotage at the plant and has already begun preparing civilians for a possible incident.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, the whereabouts of one Russian general, Sergei Sorovkin, remains unknown. The longtime ally of Yevgeny Prigozhin may be held by Russian authorities.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: One of the most divisive issues of the past few years is once again back on the EU's agenda.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: None other than migration.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Poland and Hungary hijacked talks at a summit in Brussels on Thursday and Friday, leaving leaders without any final decision on the topic. Poland and Hungary hijacked talks at a summit in Brussels on Thursday and Friday, leaving leaders without any final decision on the topic.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: They didn't even manage to come to an agreement on how to tackle the external dimension of migration, despite the fact that reaching agreements with non-EU countries is the approach that has more consensus among member states.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The best way to resolve the impact of irregular migration within our borders is to strengthen La mejor manera de resolver el impacto de la migración irregular dentro de nuestras fronteras es reforzar la cooperación entre los países de la Unión y los países de tránsito y los países de origen, pues es que me parece de puro sentido común. I have not been surprised by the blindness of some in the sense of not recognizing the need to incorporate the external dimension into the migration pact and so on.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Budapest and Warsaw are unhappy with the asylum agreement reached between EU countries early in June, which means that member states must share the burden of migrants more fairly.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The two voted against it, but it was approved by most EU countries.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Now Poland has announced a national referendum on the issue, even if Brussels has already said that the asylum agreement must be respected.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The second topic that dominated the summit agenda was Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: EU leaders insist that support will continue whatever it takes, which means giving long-term financial support and to work on security guarantees for the embattled country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The European Commission has also promised to work on how to use frozen Russian assets for the reconstruction of Ukraine, an extremely tricky legal issue.
